title: Super Bowl Mega Preview Show
description:
Kevin and Nora start by talking about the three most important things ahead of the Super Bowl (5:05). Then they talk to Detroit Lions quarterback Chase Daniel (22:42), former quarterback Carson Palmer (40:57), and Denver Broncos running back Melvin Gordon (53:42) about the Super Bowl matchup and much more. Then Kevin is joined by The Ringer’s Danny Heifetz and they talk to Minnesota Vikings receiver Justin Jefferson about his outstanding rookie season (1:12:29). After that we play an excerpt from The Ringer’s NFL video series, 'Slow News Day,' in which Kevin talks with Sean Payton about the future of football, Taysom Hill, and much more (1:24:56). Lastly The Ringer’s Danny Kelly joins Kevin to talk with former Alabama receiver and Heisman Trophy winner DeVonta Smith about his time at Alabama and the draft process (1:40:55).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
